ygData.subject: They LOOK nice ... but I never said they were real.
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes, the women in the game look nice (a leftover from a large male programming staff maybe?) But we like the real ones better. The only reason why we might
ygData.messageBody:
Yes, the women in the game look nice (a leftover from a large male programming
staff maybe?) But we like the real ones better. The only reason why we might
dream about the ones from the game are the fact that, like you, they are
willing to fight by our side in battle ... not fight over who takes the trash
out.

-Faderic

Patricia Halas wrote:

>
> OOC: If you guys are spending your nights dreaming about female PCs, think
> about this - Blonde hair, green eyes, 38 year old computer programmer
> falling asleep at her keyboard while zoning to unrest!
>
> For the Honor and Glory of Rallos Zek;
>
> Patty of Halas
> username: Patricia
> server: Bristlebane
